const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  settings: {
    index: {
      analysis: {
        analyzer: {
          my_synonyms: {
            tokenizer: "whitespace",
            filter: ["synonym"],
          },
        },
        filter: {
          synonym: {
            type: "synonym_graph",
            synonyms_path: "analysis/synonym.txt",
            updateable: true,
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      text: {
        type: "text",
        analyzer: "standard",
        search_analyzer: "my_synonyms",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
